title: Print, "St. Aignan Evêque d'Orleans (St. Aignan Bishop of Orleans), plate 111, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J. A. Meissonnier inv.; lower right: P. Chenu Sculp.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper right: 111; lower center: ST. AIGNAN EVÊQUE D'ORLEANS / Bas-relief de Sculpture en argent executé par l'auteur sur l'auteur sur la Chasse de St. Aignan d'Orleans. /  A Paris chés Huquier rue St. Jacque au coin de celle des Mathurins C.P.R.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: In arched niche, kneeling figure touched by light streaming in from ceiling; two female figures in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "St. Aignan Evêque d'Orleans (St. Aignan Bishop of Orleans), plate 111, from Oeuvres de Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier (Works by Juste-Aurèle Meissonnier)", 1748.
1748. Engraving on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-212-68.
